titles.title: Gold Star Parents Annuity Act

To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment of a monthly stipend to the surviving parents (known as "Gold Star parents") of members of the Armed Forces who die during a period of war.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

bill.summary: 5/14/2003--Introduced. Gold Star Parents Annuity Act - Directs the Secretary of Defense to pay a special pension to each person who has received a Gold Star lapel pin as a parent of a member of the armed forces who died while serving.
